entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a teacher who has a Pensieve where he stores his thoughts. He is checking if the thoughts are still there.

entities.name: pensieve
entities.description: Pensieve is an object used by Snape to store his thoughts.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student who has broken into Snape's memories and seen scenes from Snape's childhood.

relationships.description: Snape owns the Pensieve where he stores his thoughts.
Harry has broken into Snape's memories and seen scenes from Snape's childhood.
